name: Gentleman Thief
description:
This is a student made game during 2nd year of production (2020)

A stealth game about a gentleman thief who uses his wits and gadgets to sneak around to steal valuable items.

Mark Goldsack - Level Design, Lighting  & Audio

Alex Goodwins - Producer, Menu system, Audio & Cinemachiene

Caleb Appleby - AI Programming, Minigames, Bug fixing & Rebindable controls

Jack Smith-Hocking - General programming, System designer, UI implementation, Minimap & Player controller

Corey Ricci - Character animation, General modelling, General texturing

Daniel Fang - Character modelling, Character rigging, Character weight painting, Character texturing & Environment
